participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Reflective and mature for their age, Alex is often contemplative about their life choices and future.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and determined, Jordan shows resilience and dedication to their service, with a strong sense of duty.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
